title: Policewoman In New York, La Poliziotta A New York 1981

sources.title: Policewoman In New York, La Poliziotta A New York 1981
sources.description: A Texan travels to Rome to hire two police officers to impersonate a mobster's girlfriend and his most ruthless hitman. There are three language tracks on this one: Italian, English and Russian.Â  Edwich Fenech spends a lot of time running around Central Park. I belive theloci is that Alvaro Vitali gets to try to keep up with her and ends up panting a lot.
